metadata.title: CVE-2024-9680 on Ubuntu Pro FIPS-updates 18.04 LTS (bionic) - high
metadata.description: An attacker was able to achieve code execution in the content process byexploiting a use-after-free in Animation timelines. We have had reports ofthis vulnerability being exploited in the wild. This vulnerability affectsFirefox < 131.0.2, Firefox ESR < 128.3.1, Firefox ESR < 115.16.1,Thunderbird < 131.0.1, Thunderbird < 128.3.1, and Thunderbird < 115.16.0.

criterions.comment: mozjs38 package in bionic is affected and may need fixing.
mozjs52: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue.
